stimulusHtml: Scholars have theorized which of the following about the stylized animals painted on the vessel?

features.html: © RMN-Grand Palais / Art Resource, NY

choicesHtml: They represent the same animal-headed gods found during excavations at a nearby temple.
They reference mythic animals that are described in the culture’s epic literature.
They refer to hunting rituals linked to seasonal patterns of animal migration.
They represent both the wild and the domesticated animals of an agricultural society.
